languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, позвольте доложить. Я продолжаю получать сообщения о странностях в работе корабельных систем. Со всех палуб поступают отчеты о бесконтрольном открывании и закрывании дверей, врат и шлюзов — они ведут себя непредсказуемо и совершенно не слушаются команд операторов. К сожалению, это привело к жертвам среди членов экипажа. Объясняя случившееся гневливостью машинных духов, техножрецы часами поют литании для их успокоения. К сожалению, прежде, чем молитвы стабилизировали систему многие члены экипажа серьезно пострадали".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, позвольте доложить. Я продолжаю получать сообщения о странностях в работе корабельных систем. Со всех палуб поступают отчеты о бесконтрольном открывании и закрывании дверей, врат и шлюзов — они ведут себя непредсказуемо и совершенно не слушаются команд операторов. К сожалению, это привело к жертвам среди членов экипажа. Объясняя случившееся гневливостью машинных духов, техножрецы часами поют литании для их успокоения. К сожалению, прежде, чем молитвы стабилизировали систему многие члены экипажа серьезно пострадали".

languages.text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. I keep receiving messages about strange behaviours in certain ship systems. All decks report the uncontrollable opening and closing of doors, gates, and airlocks. They behave erratically and do not obey the operators' commands. Regrettably, this has led to casualties among the crew. The Tech-Priests have explained that these phenomena are being caused by the machine spirits' irascibility and have spent hours chanting litanies to soothe their anger. Unfortunately, many crew members were badly injured before the prayers could stabilise the systems."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, позвольте доложить. Я продолжаю получать сообщения о странностях в работе корабельных систем. Со всех палуб поступают отчеты о бесконтрольном открывании и закрывании дверей, врат и шлюзов — они ведут себя непредсказуемо и совершенно не слушаются команд операторов. К сожалению, это привело к жертвам среди членов экипажа. Объясняя случившееся гневливостью машинных духов, техножрецы часами поют литании для их успокоения. К сожалению, прежде, чем молитвы стабилизировали систему многие члены экипажа серьезно пострадали".

traits.locale_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. I keep receiving messages about strange behaviour of certain ship's systems. All decks report uncontrollable opening and losing of doors, gates and airlocks that behave erratically and do not obey the operators' commands. Regrettably, this has led to casualties among the crew members. The tech-priests explain these phenomena by irascibility of the machine spirits and have spent hours chanting litanies to soothe their anger. Unfortunately, many crew members were badly injured before the prayers could stabilize the system."

"Permission to report, Lord Captain. I keep receiving messages about strange behaviour of certain ship's systems. All decks report uncontrollable opening and losing of doors, gates and airlocks that behave erratically and do not obey the operators' commands. Regrettably, this has led to casualties among the crew members. The tech-priests explain these phenomena by irascibility of the machine spirits and have spent hours chanting litanies to soothe their anger. Unfortunately, many crew members were badly injured before the prayers could stabilize the system."

The Tech-Priests have explained that these phenomena are being caused by the machine spirits' irascibility and have spent hours chanting litanies to soothe their anger. Unfortunately, many crew members were badly injured before the prayers could stabilise the systems."

Unfortunately, many crew members were badly injured before the prayers could stabilise the systems."

languages.text: « J'ai un rapport pour vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je reçois de nombreux messages faisant état du comportement anormal de certains systèmes du vaisseau. On a signalé des portes, des écoutilles et des sas qui s'ouvrent et se ferment inopinément, et ce sur tous les ponts, sans distinction. Ces accès s'activent sans raison apparente et refusent d'obéir aux opérateurs. Malheureusement, ces phénomènes ont fini par coûter la vie à un membre de l'équipage. Tout cela serait la manifestation d'une colère grandissante des esprits de la machine, selon les technoprêtres, qui ont passé des heures à chanter des litanies pour tenter de les apaiser. Hélas, de nombreux membres d'équipage ont été grièvement blessés avant que les prières ne parviennent à rétablir tous les systèmes. »
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. I keep receiving messages about strange behaviours in certain ship systems. All decks report the uncontrollable opening and closing of doors, gates, and airlocks. They behave erratically and do not obey the operators' commands. Regrettably, this has led to casualties among the crew. The Tech-Priests have explained that these phenomena are being caused by the machine spirits' irascibility and have spent hours chanting litanies to soothe their anger. Unfortunately, many crew members were badly injured before the prayers could stabilise the systems."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai un rapport pour vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je reçois de nombreux messages faisant état du comportement anormal de certains systèmes du vaisseau. On a signalé des portes, des écoutilles et des sas qui s'ouvrent et se ferment inopinément, et ce sur tous les ponts, sans distinction. Ces accès s'activent sans raison apparente et refusent d'obéir aux opérateurs. Malheureusement, ces phénomènes ont fini par coûter la vie à un membre de l'équipage. Tout cela serait la manifestation d'une colère grandissante des esprits de la machine, selon les technoprêtres, qui ont passé des heures à chanter des litanies pour tenter de les apaiser. Hélas, de nombreux membres d'équipage ont été grièvement blessés avant que les prières ne parviennent à rétablir tous les systèmes. »

languages.text: “请允许我向您报告，舰长大人。我不断收到报告，说飞船的某些系统出现了古怪的状况。所有甲板都报告说，一部分门、闸门与气闸的开关无法控制。它们行为异常，不服从操作员的命令。遗憾的是，这样的事故已经导致部分船员伤亡。技术神甫解释说，这样的现象是由于机魂发脾气造成的，他们已经花了好几个小时诵经，平息它们的愤怒。遗憾的是，在祈祷生效之前，已经有很多船员受了重伤。”
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. I keep receiving messages about strange behaviours in certain ship systems. All decks report the uncontrollable opening and closing of doors, gates, and airlocks. They behave erratically and do not obey the operators' commands. Regrettably, this has led to casualties among the crew. The Tech-Priests have explained that these phenomena are being caused by the machine spirits' irascibility and have spent hours chanting litanies to soothe their anger. Unfortunately, many crew members were badly injured before the prayers could stabilise the systems."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我向您报告，舰长大人。我不断收到报告，说飞船的某些系统出现了古怪的状况。所有甲板都报告说，一部分门、闸门与气闸的开关无法控制。它们行为异常，不服从操作员的命令。遗憾的是，这样的事故已经导致部分船员伤亡。技术祭司解释说，这样的现象是由于机魂发脾气造成的，他们已经花了好几个小时诵经，平息它们的愤怒。遗憾的是，在祈祷生效之前，已经有很多船员受了重伤。”

languages.text: "Erbitte Erlaubnis, Bericht zu erstatten, Lord Captain. Ich empfange laufend Nachrichten über merkwürdiges Verhalten verschiedener Schiffssysteme. Alle Decks berichten, dass sich Türen, Tore und Luftschleusen unkontrolliert öffnen und schließen. Sie verhalten sich völlig willkürlich und gehorchen den Befehlen der Bediener nicht mehr. Bedauerlicherweise hat das zu Todesfällen in der Crew geführt. Die Techpriester sagen, dass diese Phänomene durch die Reizbarkeit der Maschinengeister ausgelöst werden. Sie haben Stunden damit zugebracht, Litaneien zu singen, um die Geister zu besänftigen. Leider wurden viele Crewmitglieder schwer verwundet, bevor die Systeme durch die Gebete stabilisiert werden konnten."
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. I keep receiving messages about strange behaviours in certain ship systems. All decks report the uncontrollable opening and closing of doors, gates, and airlocks. They behave erratically and do not obey the operators' commands. Regrettably, this has led to casualties among the crew. The Tech-Priests have explained that these phenomena are being caused by the machine spirits' irascibility and have spent hours chanting litanies to soothe their anger. Unfortunately, many crew members were badly injured before the prayers could stabilise the systems."

traits.locale_text: "Erbitte Erlaubnis, Bericht zu erstatten, Lord Captain. Ich empfange laufend Nachrichten über merkwürdiges Verhalten verschiedener Schiffssysteme. Alle Decks berichten, dass sich Türen, Tore und Luftschleusen unkontrolliert öffnen und schließen. Sie verhalten sich völlig willkürlich und gehorchen den Befehlen der Bediener nicht mehr. Bedauerlicherweise hat das zu Todesfällen in der Crew geführt. Die Techpriester sagen, dass diese Phänomene durch die Reizbarkeit der Maschinengeister ausgelöst werden. Sie haben Stunden damit zugebracht, Litaneien zu singen, um die Geister zu besänftigen. Leider wurden viele Crewmitglieder schwer verwundet, bevor die Systeme durch die Gebete stabilisiert werden konnten."

languages.text: «Permiso para informar, Lord Capitán. Sigo recibiendo mensajes sobre comportamientos inusuales en algunos sistemas de la nave. Todas las cubiertas informan del avistamiento de puertas, compuertas y esclusas abriéndose y cerrándose sin control. Muestran un comportamiento errático y no obedecen a las órdenes de los operadores. Lamentablemente, esto ha provocado bajas entre los miembros de la tripulación. Los tecnosacerdotes han explicado que este fenómeno es provocado por la irascibilidad de los espíritus máquina y han estado horas entonando letanías para calmar su ira. Por desgracia, muchos tripulantes ya habían sufrido daños graves antes de la estabilización de los sistemas tras las oraciones».
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. I keep receiving messages about strange behaviours in certain ship systems. All decks report the uncontrollable opening and closing of doors, gates, and airlocks. They behave erratically and do not obey the operators' commands. Regrettably, this has led to casualties among the crew. The Tech-Priests have explained that these phenomena are being caused by the machine spirits' irascibility and have spent hours chanting litanies to soothe their anger. Unfortunately, many crew members were badly injured before the prayers could stabilise the systems."

traits.locale_text: «Permiso para informar, Lord Capitán. Sigo recibiendo mensajes sobre comportamientos inusuales en algunos sistemas de la nave. Todas las cubiertas informan del avistamiento de puertas, compuertas y esclusas abriéndose y cerrándose sin control. Muestran un comportamiento errático y no obedecen a las órdenes de los operadores. Lamentablemente, esto ha provocado bajas entre los miembros de la tripulación. Los tecnosacerdotes han explicado que este fenómeno es provocado por la irascibilidad de los espíritus máquina y han estado horas entonando letanías para calmar su ira. Por desgracia, muchos tripulantes ya habían sufrido daños graves antes de la estabilización de los sistemas tras las oraciones».

languages.text: 「報告させてください、ロード・キャプテン。とある船内システムにおかしな動きがあると、メッセージで絶えず届いています。すべてのデッキから、ドア、ゲート、エアロックが制御不能で閉じたり開いたりするとの報告がありました。不規則な動作で、オペレーターの命令に従いません。残念ですが、この不具合でクルーから死傷者が出ました。技術司祭の説明では、この現象は機械精霊の癇癪のせいで、怒りを和らげようと何時間も連祷を唱えたようです。不幸にも、多くのクルーが祈りが終わってシステムが安定する前に重傷を負ってしまいました」
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. I keep receiving messages about strange behaviours in certain ship systems. All decks report the uncontrollable opening and closing of doors, gates, and airlocks. They behave erratically and do not obey the operators' commands. Regrettably, this has led to casualties among the crew. The Tech-Priests have explained that these phenomena are being caused by the machine spirits' irascibility and have spent hours chanting litanies to soothe their anger. Unfortunately, many crew members were badly injured before the prayers could stabilise the systems."

traits.locale_text: 「報告させてください、ロード・キャプテン。とある船内システムにおかしな動きがあると、メッセージで絶えず届いています。すべてのデッキから、ドア、ゲート、エアロックが制御不能で閉じたり開いたりするとの報告がありました。不規則な動作で、オペレーターの命令に従いません。残念ですが、この不具合でクルーから死傷者が出ました。技術司祭の説明では、この現象は機械精霊の癇癪のせいで、怒りを和らげようと何時間も連祷を唱えたようです。不幸にも、多くのクルーが祈りが終わってシステムが安定する前に重傷を負ってしまいました」

languages.text: "İzninizle rapor veriyorum Lord Kaptan. Geminin belli sistemlerindeki tuhaf davranışlar hakkında mesajlar alıyorum. Tüm güverteler; kapıların, geçitlerin ve hava kilitlerinin kontrolsüzce açılıp kapandığını rapor ediyor. Düzensiz davranışlar sergiliyor ve operatörlerin komutlarına uymuyorlar. Ne yazık ki bundan kaynaklı olarak mürettebatta kayıplar yaşandı. Tekno Rahipler, bu fenomenin sebebinin makine ruhlarının kızmış olması olduğunu söylediler ve bu öfkeyi yatıştırmak için saatler boyunca dualar okudular. Ne yazık ki duaların sistemleri stabilize etmesi öncesinde birçok tayfa ağır yaralandı."
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. I keep receiving messages about strange behaviours in certain ship systems. All decks report the uncontrollable opening and closing of doors, gates, and airlocks. They behave erratically and do not obey the operators' commands. Regrettably, this has led to casualties among the crew. The Tech-Priests have explained that these phenomena are being caused by the machine spirits' irascibility and have spent hours chanting litanies to soothe their anger. Unfortunately, many crew members were badly injured before the prayers could stabilise the systems."
